com.ajah.servlet.util
Class SessionUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.ajah.servlet.util.SessionUtils

public class SessionUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Utilities that deal with HttpSessions.

Author:
Eric F. Savage

Constructor Summary

Method Summary
static void clearSessionAttributes(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
          This method will look for a session on the request, and if one is found call clearSessionAttributes(HttpSession).
static void clearSessionAttributes(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
          This method will call HttpSession.removeAttribute(String) on each attribute to ensure that they are cleared.

Constructor Detail

SessionUtils

public SessionUtils()
Method Detail

eradicate

public static void eradicate(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
A more explicit heavy-duty version of HttpSession.invalidate(). This method will remove all attributes and clear all cookies, in addition to calling HttpSession.invalidate().

Parameters:
request - Request to get cookies and session from, required.
response - Response to set updated cookies on. Not required, but cookies cannot be cleared if null.

clearSessionAttributes

public static void clearSessionAttributes(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
This method will look for a session on the request, and if one is found call clearSessionAttributes(HttpSession).

Parameters:
request - request on which to find a session to clear, required.

clearSessionAttributes

public static void clearSessionAttributes(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
This method will call HttpSession.removeAttribute(String) on each attribute to ensure that they are cleared.

Parameters:
session - session to clear, required.
